sentences.en: His forces routed in 53 BC outside the Mesopotamian city of Carre - today's Harran - and he was beheaded.
sentences.cn: 他的军队在公元前53年在美索不达米亚城市卡雷 ----- 今天的哈兰城外溃败了.他也被杀死.

sentences.en: Its prototypes are found in Egyptian and Mesopotamian art.
sentences.cn: 在埃及和美索不达米亚的艺术中能找到它的原型.

sentences.en: Many of these traditions began with Mesopotamian celebration of New Years.
sentences.cn: 许多这些传统开始于美索不达米亚庆祝新年.

trans.tran_cn: 美索不达米亚（两河流域）
